title: Domestic Dangers: The Oklahoma City Memorial & Museum mission and vision is more vital than ever.
description:
Description: 27 years after the deadly domestic terror attack at the Alfred P. Murrah federal building, the mission of the Oklahoma City Memorial & Museum is essential. Executive Director Kari Watkins joins us.

https://mobile.twitter.com/okcnm
https://memorialmuseum.com/
